DOC.brief_summary: Intramuscular ( IM ) oxytocin gold standard prophylactic therapy post partum haemorrhage ( PPH ) . However , resource-poor setting within develop world , stability therefore effectiveness prophylactic IM oxytocin diminish lack appropriate refrigeration facility availability train health care professional ( HCPs ) administer IM injection .
